Articles.Content: Rather than just removing mods that are nullreferencing, you should report the problems in the respective threads for the mods.

Rather than just removing mods that are nullreferencing, you should report the problems in the respective threads for the mods.

I'm happy to do so but I'd still like to know the general procedure for how people handle these encounters.
How did you tell which mod was the source? Debug is giving me a lot of null errors but no info on what.

How did you tell which mod was the source? Debug is giving me a lot of null errors but no info on what.

I guessed that it was EVE because it is the only mod I can think of that deals with clouds. I removed the EVE mod and the first NullReference went away, so you can always guess and check I suppose.

Ofc 'Clouds' could have been a reference to anything, I just got lucky.
EVE spams Clouds.Clouds.Update NREs whenever you're not in the flight scene, always has for me. Nothing to worry about, or so I'm told.

EVE spams Clouds.Clouds.Update NREs whenever you're not in the flight scene, always has for me. Nothing to worry about, or so I'm told.
